name: Controlled useState
description: Visual bar list with percentage values and clickable bars for updating selected items using controlled components with useState hooks
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage items array with label and valuePercent properties, selected item state, and form validation. Implements clickable progress bars with inline styles, form updates, and comprehensive statistics calculation.
features: Visual horizontal bars representing percentage values (0-100)
Clickable bars for item selection with console logging
Form for updating selected item values with validation
Real-time bar width updates using inline styles
Comprehensive statistics (sum, average, min, max, count)
Bootstrap progress bars with custom colors
Selected item highlighting and info panel
